law.text: An applicant or recipient of medical assistance shall be liable to the Kentucky Medical Assistance Program for any payment received from a third party to the extent of medical assistance paid on the recipients' behalf under Title XIX of the Social Security Act.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 506, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980.
